casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of New York, Appellants, v. Gamble LATROVE, Jr., James P. Knowles, and William S. Erichs, Trustees of Thermlo-dyne Radio Corporation, Bankrupt, Appellees. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. October 31, 1928. No. 3897. Albert Ottinger, Atty. Gen. (Robert P. Beyer, Deputy Asst. Atty. Gen., of counsel), for appellant. James I. Boyce, of Wilmington, Del. (Ralph M. Arkush, of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before WOOLLEY and DAVIS, Circuit Judges, and KIRKPATRICK, District Judge.

See, also, 26 F.(2d) 716. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed, on the opinion of Judge Morris in 26 F.(2d) 713.
